ygData.msgSnippet: OK assuming we can get this Junkion reject flying again whats to keep the Preds from picking us off in midflight? And how will history explain all these

"OK assuming we can get this Junkion reject flying again whats to 
keep the Preds from picking us off in midflight? And how will history 
explain all these changes in technology? If the Decepticons awaken 
first then what will keep them from turning the tech against the 
Autobots?." There were to many questions going through his logic 
circuits at the moment.

"I know these to be legitimate questions because if I were in that 
position then I'd look for any advantage I could find. I hope you 
have a plan B in mind just in case."

Lunarpine had a bad fealing about the plan, and his fealings were 
seldom wrong.

-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing:;
> 
> She smiled warmly at Lunarpine. "Actually, I thought of something.  
> we can salvage some parts of this ship. But isn't ramulus out 
getting 
> parts? Sure all those of us who had pods and try to retrieve them 
and 
> use them for parts as well.  We can , well maybe, try an attack on 
a 
> pred base and take some supplies from them?" she looked nervously 
> about on that last suggestion. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Lunarpine listens carefully about the ark, the plans were to 
either 
> > rebuild or repair, either job could prove impossible.
> > 
> > "One question Striker, where are we supposed to get the equipment 
> for 
> > another ship of die cast construction? We don't have a Crucible 
> large 
> > enough for those quantities of metal."
> > 
> > He looked at Shadow Wing as she entered the room, "Hey wing, come 
> to 
> > add some more intelect to the meeting?"
> >
